articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects Branch Factory of Ryongsong Machine Complex
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects Branch Factory of Ryongsong Machine Complex 
Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il provided field guidance to a branch factory of the Ryongsong Machine Complex.
					 He went round the room devoted to the education in the revolutionary history. 
					
					 Thanks to the wise leadership and meticulous care of President Kim Il Sung the factory has turned into a machine-building base capable of successfully manufacturing any latest type machine if it is determined, he said, adding that the revolutionary exploits performed by the President in establishing the Juche-based machine-building industry would be recorded with brilliance in the history of the country. 
					
					 After being briefed on the factory before a big map showing a panoramic view of the factory, he went round various workshops to learn in detail about the technological updating and production there. 
					
					 He highly appreciated the feats performed by the workers of the factory intensely loyal to the party and the revolution, noting that it is a great success that they waged a dynamic drive for updating the existing equipment by fully displaying the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance, thereby replacing them by the equipment that reached the cutting-edge level while economizing a huge amount of funds. 
					
					 Noting that it is a signal success that the workers of the factory have put the production processes on a modern and scientific basis by their own efforts and with their own technology through a high-pitched drive to push back the frontiers of the latest science and technology, he stressed that this eye-opening leap forward is a demonstration of the fighting spirit of the workers of Ryongsong taking the lead in strictly adhering to the socialist principle, the revolutionary principle despite any severe tempest and advancing in the van of the socialist cause in the same spirit as displayed during the Arduous March and the inexhaustible strength of the heroic Korean workers.
					
					 The DPRK could successfully realize the socialist industrialization in so brief span of time and lay a solid foundation of the independent national economy as it is strongly backed by many powerful machine plants such as the Ryongsong Machine Complex, he said, adding that the cause of building a thriving nation is sure to triumph thanks to the Juche-oriented machine-building industry. 
					
					 He set forth the tasks to be carried out by the factory.
					
					 Seeing different kinds of building materials and daily necessities made by the factory by making an effective use of by-products, he said that the quality of the products is very high. He praised the workers of the factory for such spirit of serving people as working hard to improve the standard of people's living. 
					
					 He made the rounds of the newly built dining-room of workers and supply service facilities to take care of their living as their real father would do.
					
					 The signal successes made by the factory in recent years are attributable to the fact that its officials have scientifically conducted the overall management of the factory including production, development of technology and supply service on the principle of profitability in keeping with the principle of the socialist economic management, he noted, adding that it is of weighty importance in speeding up the advance for a great surge for the officials to scientifically and minutely conduct the economic operation and business activities. 
					
					 He expressed great expectation and belief that the workers of the factory would bring about uninterrupted innovations and leap forward in the van of the drive for effecting a revolutionary surge in the efforts to build a thriving nation under the uplifted red flag of the revolution.
					
					 He was accompanied by Kwak Pom Gi, chief secretary of the South Hamgyong Provincial Committee of the WPK, Kim Ki Nam and Hong Sok Hyong, members of the Political Bureau and secretaries of the C.C., the WPK, Kim Kyong Hui, member of the Political Bureau and department director of the C.C., the WPK, Jang Song Thaek, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and vice-chairman of the NDC, Pak To Chun and Thae Jong Su, alternate members of the Political Bureau and secretaries of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: Choe Thae Bok Leaves for China and Mongolia
articles.content:
Choe Thae Bok Leaves for China and Mongolia
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly led by its Chairman Choe Thae Bok left here Tuesday to visit China and Mongolia. 
					 A delegation of the Workers' Party of Korea led by Kim Yong Il, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the WPK, also left here on the same day to participate in the 6th general meeting of the International Conference of Asian Political Parties to be held in Cambodia.
					
					 The delegation is expected to visit Laos and Vietnam.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Congratulates Burkina Faso's President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Congratulates Burkina Faso's President
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Tuesday sent a congratulatory message to Blaise Compaore upon his reelection as president in the recent presidential election held in Burkina Faso.
					 Expressing belief that the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in the interests of the two peoples, the message sincerely wished the president success in his work for the socio-economic development of the country and peace and stability in the region.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Central African Republic's President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Central African Republic's President
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Monday sent a message of greetings to Francois Bozize, President of the Central African Republic, on the occasion of the 52nd anniversary of its proclamation.
					 Kim in the message sincerely wished the friendly Central African Republic peace and prosperity, expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger.

articles.title: Choe Yong Rim Greets Barbados' PM
articles.content:
Choe Yong Rim Greets Barbados' PM
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- Choe Yong Rim, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, Tuesday sent a message of greetings to Freundel Stuart, prime minister of Barbados, on the occasion of the 44th anniversary of its independence.
					The message wished the Prime Minister new success in his work for the prosperity of the country and the wellbeing of its people.

articles.title: Lao's 35th Founding Day, Kaysone's 90th Birthday Observed
articles.content:
Lao's 35th Founding Day, Kaysone's 90th Birthday Observed
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- A meeting and film show were held at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Corps Club on Tuesday on the occasions of the 35th anniversary of the founding of the Lao People's Democratic Republic and the 90th birthday of President Kaysone Phomvihane. 
					 Present at the meeting on invitation were Chaleune Warinthrasak, Lao ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 Also present there were Ryang Man Gil, chairman of the Pyongyang City People's Committee who doubles as chairman of the DPRK-Laos Friendship Association, officials concerned and working people in the city.
					
					Ryang Man Gil said in his speech that the friendly relations between the two countries provided by President Kim Il Sung together with Kaysone Phomvihane are favorably developing under the deep care of General Secretary Kim Jong Il and Choummaly Saynasone.
					
					 Referring to the fact that the DPRK and Laos closely cooperated with each other in the struggle to build socialism against imperialism, he stressed that the DPRK would as ever make positive efforts to boost the friendly relations provided by the leaders of the two countries.
					
					 Chaleune Warinthrasak in a speech extended deep thanks to Kim Jong Il for having extended support, material and moral, to Laos.
					
					 He expressed his hope that the Korean people firmly rallied around Kim Jong Il would achieve great success in their building of a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation.
					
					 At the end of the meeting, the participants watched Korean documentary film "President Kim Il Sung Meets Foreign Heads of State and Prominent Figures" Part 7.

articles.title: Tongmun Secondary School Named after Kim Jong Chol
articles.content:
Tongmun Secondary School Named after Kim Jong Chol
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- Tongmun Secondary School in Jongju City, North Phyongan Province, was named after Kim Jong Chol, a hero of the DPRK.
					 Kim grew up, given an ample opportunity of learning under the socialist system of the DPRK, before performing feats while serving in the Korean People's Internal Security Forces. He did such heroic deed as dedicating his life to rescuing his comrades from the jaw of death in the construction site of the Huichon Power Station.
					
					 A ceremony of renaming the school took place on Sunday.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Observed
						
Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- A meeting to study the Juche-oriented ideas of literature and art took place at Pyongyang University of Dance Tuesday to mark the 20th anniversary of the publication of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Theory of Dancing Art".
					 The work published on Nov. 30, Juche 79 (1990) clarifies the principled requirements and ways for carrying forward and developing the brilliant tradition of Korean dancing art established in the period of the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle led by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Attending the meeting were officials concerned and creators, artistes, teachers and students in the field of dancing art.
					
					 Speakers said that the work is a library of Juche-oriented dancing art as it systematizes in an integral manner and comprehensively deals with the idea and theory of dancing art.
					
					 They stressed that the work gives comprehensive and perfect answers to all the theoretical and practical issues arising in creating the Korean-style dancing art ranging from the essence of dances and their origin and development to their creation, depiction and notation.
					
					 The speakers underlined the need for all the creators and artistes I the field of dance to deeply grasp Kim Jong Il's idea and theory of developing the Juche-oriented dancing art and bring about a new turn in the creation of dance pieces as required by the Songun era.

articles.title: Guidelines for Juche-based Dancing Art
articles.content:
Guidelines for Juche-based Dancing Art
Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- Twenty years has elapsed since General Secretary Kim Jong Il published a famous work, "Theory of Dancing Art", on November 30, Juche 79 (1990).
					 The work formulates the distinctive character and basic mission of the dancing art and the orientation of its development newly elucidated by the Juche idea. It also gives principles and ways of applying them to dance creation and performance and expounds all theoretical and practical issues arising in perfecting and fully introducing Korean-style dance notation. 
					
					 Since the work was published, the originality and validity of Kim Jong Il's idea and theory on the Juche-based dancing art have been fully demonstrated, many famous dance pieces created and the dance notation brought to perfection.
					
					 Grand gymnastic and artistic performances "Ever-victorious Workers' Party of Korea" and "Arirang" were created as masterpieces and the folk dance suites "Song of the Seasons" and "People in the Walled City of Pyongyang", dance suite "Army and People United in One Mind around the Leader", dances "I Can Still See Victory in the Revolution!" and "We Will Never Give up Even an Inch of Our Land" and many other dance works of various themes and forms produced on the basis of national customs, grandiose current of the times and the heroic struggle of the Korean people.
					
					 The dance notation has become smaller in number of notes and easier to understand the composition and combination of dance movements in a theoretical way and note them.
					
					 Thanks to Kim Jong Il's outstanding idea and theory, the dancing art of Korea has developed into a Juche-based, revolutionary one based on national dance style and the people's life.

articles.title: New Postage Stamps Issued
articles.content:
New Postage Stamps Issued
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The State Stamp Bureau of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea has issued four individual stamps containing pictures dating back to the Ri Dynasty.
					 The pictures are "Waves of Sea off Ongchon" and "Pine Tree and Hawk" drawn by Jong Son and Sin Yun Bok, celebrated artists in the 18th century, "After Gathering Medicinal Herbs" by Kim Hong Do representing the 18th and 19th centuries and "Reeds and Wild Geese" by Jo Sok Jin in the mid-19th century and early the 20th century.
					
					 The Korean paintings are characterized by composition broad enough to depict nature in a grandiose, beautiful and wonderful way and by formative brushwork.
					
					 The realistic paintings are well known in not only Korea but other countries.

articles.title: Monthly Samil, ARF Organ
articles.content:
Monthly Samil, ARF Organ
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- Seventy-four years has passed since President Kim Il Sung founded Monthly Samil, organ of the Association for the Restoration of the Fatherland (ARF).
					 After the Nanhutou meeting (February 27-March 3, 1936), he planned to organize the ARF and found its organ in order to implement the strategic policy adopted at the meeting to expand the armed struggle into the homeland. 
					
					 With preparations fully made for the publication of the revolutionary magazine, he launched it on December 1, Juche 25 (1936).
					
					 The periodical also served as the organ of the Party Committee of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army (KPRA) and a popular political magazine for all Koreans.
					
					 It carried editorials explaining the President's famous works, including the "Ten-point Programme of the Association for the Restoration of the Fatherland", to provide KPRA members and local people with a correct understanding of the character and mission of the Korean revolution, lay solid organizational and ideological foundations for party founding and strengthen the driving force of the revolution.
					
					 It, under the fixed title "News of Our Nation's Movement for the Country's Liberation", also regularly introduced the ARF's activities conducted throughout the country, playing a big role in rallying the local people in the anti-Japanese national united front. 
					
					 Meanwhile, it paid close attention to arming the KPRA members and the Korean people with the spirit of patriotism and internationalism.
					
					 After the magazine was founded, the ARF began to be rapidly expanded.

articles.title: Signal Success in Sturgeon Breeding
articles.content:
Signal Success in Sturgeon Breeding
Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The DPRK completely succeeded in massively breeding sturgeon in freshwater and sea water after building large-scale modern sturgeon breeding centers in its western coastal area. 
					There appeared the Ryongjong Fish Breeding Farm in the best place near the Ryongjong Spring, one of the nation's natural monuments, where hundreds of liters of quality spring water is gushing out per second. It has established a perfect system for fish breeding, putting the sturgeon breeding and processing on the world's advanced level and succeeding in artificial hatching to open a prospect for large-scale sturgeon breeding. 
					
					It has more than 160 fish ponds depending on abundant water from the spring, hatching and fry breeding grounds, a water filtering ground, an assorted feed processing factory, a protein feed processing ground, a combined control panel, etc. 
					
					Leader Kim Jong Il, while providing on-the-spot guidance to the fish breeding ground recently, made sure that tasty dermo-carp was called "Ryongjong fish." The fish breeding ground has dozens of ponds for breeding this kind of fish. 
					
					Thanks to the recycling water system clear and pure water with a temperature of 13-14 degrees centigrade runs into the outdoor fish ponds in all seasons. They teem with new species of quality fishes which inhabit in cold and warm water including more than ten species of tens of thousands of sturgeon, each weighing 135 at maximum, rainbow trout and char.
					
					The management and operation of the fish breeding ground has been put on the level of cutting-edge science and technology. The basic production processes and observation of the compound of the fish breeding ground and water in the breeding ponds are computerized and oxygen and feed are scientifically supplied to them on the basis of the real time monitoring of water quality in each district. 
					
					It also succeeded in fully acclimatizing sturgeon and rainbow trout artificially propagated in freshwater to sea water and realized the sea water breeding of sturgeon considered possible only in sea water with low salinity in sea water with salinity above 30 per cent.
					
					A special area for conserving sturgeon covering more than a hundred hectares has been created in the waters off Ryongyon to bring about a great change in the sturgeon breeding. 
					
					Sea cucumber, etc. are artificially bred in the sturgeon breeding ponds and aquatic centers in the sea water are producing high quality fishes such as red sea-bream, sea bass, rock fish and shell fish.
					
					The introduction of the principle of drawing sea water by use of tidal energy from the West Sea and a new Korean style sea cultivation method led to ensuring an intensive safe fish breeding by use of natural water without consuming even a single kilowatt of electricity and boosting the productivity by leaps and bounds. 
					
					This represents the twelfth Songun scenery in socialist Korea which witnessed a dramatic turn in the development of fish breeding as required by the 21st century.

articles.title: KCNA Blasts Japan's Disgusting Behavior at UN
articles.content:
KCNA Blasts Japan's Disgusting Behavior at UN
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- Japan was so imprudent as to take the lead in seeking the adoption of a "resolution on human rights issue" in the DPRK while vociferating about the "abduction issue" at the Third Committee of the 65th UN General Assembly.
					 The Japanese delegate blustered that the human rights performance in the DPRK should be called into question at the UN General Assembly and other fora, asserting that "the issue of Japanese abductees" still remains unsettled and talking about "non-implementation" of someone and his "lack of specific actions."
					
					 Japan persistently peddles the "abduction issue" whenever an opportunity presents itself in the international arena. This is a despicable and disgusting behavior intended to cover up its hideous crimes committed by Japan against humanity in the past at any cost and dodge the settlement of them. 
					
					 Japan is so shameless as to use the "abduction issue" as a lever for diverting elsewhere the international community's criticism of its stand on the issue of settling its past crimes. 
					
					 As far as human rights are concerned, Japan is absolutely not qualified to talk about them.
					
					 The Japanese imperialists perpetrated thrice-cursed crimes against the Korean people during their occupation of Korea, thus leaving an indelible stain on history as a war criminal state which committed unheard-of human rights abuses. 
					
					 They forcibly drafted at least 8.4 million young and middle-aged Koreans, forcing them to do medieval slave labor or using them as cannon fodder. They brutally killed more than one million Koreans.
					
					 They took away 200 000 Korean women, ranging from girls in their teens to married women, to  battle fields as sexual slaves for their aggressor forces, sacrificing their youth and violating their chastity. They unhesitatingly perpetrated such criminal acts as brutally killing those women in a bid to conceal their despicable crimes.
					
					 The angry voices of those who have suffered mental and physical pain for more than half a century after the war due to the crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists are heard and the international community is growing vocal demanding the probe into the truth about their past crimes, state apology ad reparation for them.
					
					 Nevertheless, Japan is deceiving the world, while working hard to shirk the responsibility for the hideous crimes committed by it against humanity in the past.
					
					  Japan has not yet redeemed its hideous crimes committed against humanity though 65 years have passed since its defeat but is keeping mum about all of them and painting itself as a victim, peddling the already settled "abduction issue" whenever an opportunity presents itself. This is the height of effrontery. 
					
					 The international community had better immediately call into question the hideous human rights abuses committed by Japan in the past and its refusal to settle them when dealing with human rights issues.

articles.title: Trend of Development of Nuclear Energy for Peaceful Purposes Irresistible
articles.content:
Trend of Development of Nuclear Energy for Peaceful Purposes Irresistible
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- It has become an irresistible trend to develop and use nuclear energy for peaceful purposes worldwide, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a signed article. 
					 It goes on:
					
					 In recent years economy has made rapid progress and the demand for energy increased day by day whereas fossil fuel resources are running out. This reality is further increasing the concern for energy worldwide.
					
					 Many countries are now stepping up the positive moves to decrease dependence on fossil fuel and make a wide use of alternative fuel.
					
					 It is an inviolable right for developing countries to develop and use nuclear energy for peaceful purposes. This right can never be a monopoly of a few countries. All the countries of the world should be allowed to exercise this right.
					
					 What matters is that some Western forces are applying such partial double standards as slapping pressure and sanctions against those countries which incur their displeasure over their nuclear activities for peaceful purposes. They are groundlessly pulling them up while conniving at and cooperating with those countries which are to their liking in their nuclear activities.
					
					 Some Western countries claim that those countries outside the NPT have no right to nuclear development for peaceful purposes but the reality is quite different from it.
					
					 The nuclear activities for peaceful purposes are the inviolable sovereign right of all members of the international community.
					
					 It entirely conforms to the international trend of development and use of nuclear energy for the DPRK to opt for the construction of its own light water reactor power station for the purpose of rounding off the structure of the Juche-based nuclear power industry. It also paves the way for meeting the ever-growing need for electricity in the DPRK.
					
					 The construction of light water reactor is brisk in the DPRK and a modern factory for uranium enrichment equipped with thousands of centrifuges is operating to supply fuel to them. The development of nuclear energy for peaceful purposes to meet the need for electricity will be stepped up in the future.

articles.title: US-S. Korean Maneuvers for War Aggression against DPRK Flailed
articles.content:
US-S. Korean Maneuvers for War Aggression against DPRK Flailed
Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and the south Korean puppet authorities perpetrated military provocations in waters of the West Sea of Korea and are now kicking up much fuss about "armed provocations from the north" and the like, making profound confusion of right and wrong in a bid to create the impression that the DPRK was to blame for them. The U.S. warlike forces are escalating the military pressure upon the DPRK, talking about "strong military support" to south Korea.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 The recent firing of dozens of shells by the south Korean puppet warmongers into the territorial waters of the DPRK side at the tacit connivance of the U.S. imperialists did not occur due to the malfunction of any weapons or misguided firing. This was a premeditated and deliberate grave military provocation aimed at another Korean war as it was committed as a follow-up of the warship "Cheonan" case.
					
					 This proves that the U.S. was behind the recent Yonphyong Island incident as was the case with the "Cheonan" case and the U.S. was the arch criminal who deliberately planned and wire-pulled the incident. 
					
					 This was clearly evidenced by the fact that no sooner had the Yonphyong Island incident taken place than the U.S. hurled nuclear carrier George Washington into the West Sea of Korea for staging again large-scale exercises for a new war together with the south Korean puppet forces. This was the strategic aim pursued by the U.S. imperialists through the on-going Hoguk military exercises.
					
					 The U.S. is wholly to blame for the touch-and-go situation on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The "military threat" touted by the U.S. imperialists is nothing but sophism intended to justify their reckless military provocations and find a pretext for igniting a war.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to drop its wrong military calculation and stop the adventurous war exercises, facing up to the present situation with a cool head.

articles.title: US-S. Korea's Escalating Moves for War Aggression against DPRK Flayed
articles.content:
US-S. Korea's Escalating Moves for War Aggression against DPRK Flayed
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The DPRK-targeted adventurous war maneuvers kicked off by the U.S. and the south Korean war-like forces in the West Sea of Korea on Nov. 28 may spill over into an all-out war any time, warns Minju Joson Tuesday in a signed commentary. It discloses the danger of their escalating moves for a war of aggression against the DPRK.
					 What should not be overlooked is the fact that the U.S. super-large nuclear carrier George Washington is involved in these war maneuvers, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The said saber-rattling is fraught with the danger of an all-out war which may break any moment. 
					
					 What merits a serious attention is that the above-said moves for a war of aggression against the DPRK are escalating.
					
					  These moves bring to bolder relief their ulterior intention. What they seek is to strain the situation on the Korean Peninsula and ignite a war of aggression against the DPRK under any pretext. As a matter of fact, the south Korean military is busy working out new "rules for battles" and introducing "precision guided weapons for destroying underground facilities in the north" on the instruction of traitor Lee Myung Bak for thoroughly countering "local war" and "asymmetric combat power."
					
					 If the U.S. and the south Korean war-like forces fire even a shell into the inviolable land and territorial waters of the DPRK, they will have to pay dearly for this.
					
					 They would be well advised to properly understand who their rival is and stop at once their moves for a war of aggression against the DPRK.

articles.title: US Termed Worst Human Rights Abuser
articles.content:
US Termed Worst Human Rights Abuser
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- Amnesty International recently made public a report on the human rights abuses perpetrated by the United States. The report deals with concrete facts that the CIA secretly kidnapped and arrested innocent people after labeling them as "terrorists" in Europe and other regions and countries after the Sept. 11 incident as part of the "war against terrorism." 
					 Minju Joson Tuesday observes in a signed commentary:  Amnesty International's release of the above-said report clearly indicated that the U.S. is the kingpin of genocide and human rights abuses as it has no right to talk about human rights, inviolable words. 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Delegates of many countries at a recent meeting of the group for the periodical review of the universal human rights performance of the UN Human Rights Council roundly exposed and strongly condemned the U.S. for its human rights abuses at home and abroad and took issue with them. This clearly proves that the U.S. is the worst human rights abuser in the world. 
					
					 The U.S. is apt to take issue with the "human rights performance" of other countries this or that way while crying out for "protecting the human rights" whenever a chance presents itself. It likes to behave as if it were "an international human rights judge" which nobody recognizes. It invents "human rights issues" to use them as pretexts for interfering in internal affairs of other anti-imperialist independent countries and raises them as leverages for justifying its moves for aggression and war against the sovereign states and toppling their governments. 
					
					 The noisy human rights racket kicked up by the U.S. only lays bare its brazen-faced, base and despicable nature. The U.S. set up secret prisons in various regions of the world and committed such human rights abuses as inhuman torture and maltreatment of guiltless people after kidnapping and arresting them on the suspicion of "being terrorists." Yet, it is building public opinion and internationalizing someone's "human rights issue." This behavior can neither be justified nor tolerated. 
					
					 The U.S. had better discard the mask of "human rights protector", honestly admit all the human rights abuses committed against humankind so far and meet a stern judgment of history.

articles.title: Foolish Ambition of S. Korean Warmongers Blasted
articles.content:
Foolish Ambition of S. Korean Warmongers Blasted
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The foolish ambition of the south Korean warmongers to "preserve" the "northern limit line" can never come true, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a signed article.
					 The recent provocation perpetrated by the south Korean puppet forces was part of their sinister moves to "preserve" the said line, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The ulterior  aim sought by them through this was to make public believe that the DPRK recognized the waters around Yonphyong Island as their "territorial waters" in case there was no physical reaction on the part of the DPRK to their shelling. 
					
					 The "northern limit line" touted by the south Korean warmongers is nothing but an unjustifiable illegal bogus line. The puppet forces seek to justify their recent military provocation under the pretext of this line. 
					
					 But it is stipulated in the Korean Armistice Agreement that all the waters lying to the north and west of the provincial boundary line between Hwanghae-do and Kyonggi-do shall be under the military control of the Korean People's Army. The UN forces side also clarified that it has under its control only five islets--Paekryong, Thaechong, Sochong, Yonphyong and Udo islets in the waters under the military control of the DPRK side.
					
					 Even in the light of the UN Convention on Sea and the south Korean "law on territorial waters" the "northern limit line" cannot be recognized as a demarcation line as it is clearly drawn inside the territorial waters of the DPRK. 
					
					 The south Korean puppet group is describing the recent provocation as "a violation of the AA." It is so wild rumor that it is not worth consideration.
					
					 The war maneuvers being staged by the south Korean warmongers, again making a far-fetched assertion about the "northern limit line," bring to light their dangerous criminal intention to use the recent incident as a fuse to ignite a war against the DPRK. Traitor Lee Myung Bak's noisy call for "a several fold-punishment" of the DPRK was aimed to hype the incident and ignite a war of aggression against the DPRK come what may.
					
					  If the south Korean bellicose forces persist in their moves to "preserve the northern limit line," failing to draw a lesson from the incident, the DPRK will take strong countermeasures, warns the article.

articles.title: S. Korea's Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Smear Campaign under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korea's Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Smear Campaign under Fire
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- Some days ago the south Korean authorities co-sponsored at the UN together with foreign forces a "resolution on the human rights issue in the north", a conspiratorial one against the DPRK, and then voted for it without hesitation.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is another grave encroachment on the dignity and sovereignty of the DPRK and a despicable move to intensify the international racket for stifling the DPRK as it is a clear revelation of their inveterate ambition for confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 It is south Korea which has turned into the worst barren land of democracy and human rights in the world where the right of the working people to existence is being ruthlessly trampled down.
					
					 This is clearly evidenced by the fact that some days ago a south Korean court ruled that the slain evacuees are criminals though they were burned to death due to the fascist authorities' brutal suppression while struggling in defence of their vital rights and in protest against the treacherous regime's forcible evacuation of houses.
					
					 The "human rights" racket kicked up by the south Korean puppet group in the international arena in league with foreign forces while taking issue with "the human rights issue in the north", a fiction, would only result in deepening the distrust between the north and the south and escalating the confrontation between them and sparking off a war as it is aimed at doing harm to the system in the DPRK and realizing the ambition for "achieving unification under liberal democracy" from A to Z. Herein lies the criminal nature of the anti-DPRK "human rights" racket of the south Korean authorities.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group is no more than forces representing traitors to the nation as it is hell-bent on the moves for escalating confrontation and war moves, utterly indifferent to the collapse of the inter-Korean relations and the destiny of the nation.
					
					 The south Korean puppet group would be well advised to stop at once the anti-DPRK "human rights" racket as it is as foolish an act as pricking one's own eyes.

articles.title: More Dynamic Struggle to Win Victory in Building Thriving Nation Called for
articles.content:
More Dynamic Struggle to Win Victory in Building Thriving Nation Called for
Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- All the party members, servicepersons and people of the DPRK should conduct a more dynamic struggle for the victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche and the cause of building a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea, bearing deep in mind the spirit of the Conference of the WPK which reflected the new historic era of the development of the Korean revolution.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The Conference of the WPK held in September was of great historic significance in that it provided a sure guarantee for more dynamically advancing the revolutionary cause of Juche and the cause of building a thriving socialist nation which has now entered a new stage of development.
					
					 The spirit of the conference calls for developing the WPK into an eternal party of President Kim Il Sung, implementing to the last his behests, successfully accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche that started in Mt. Paektu true to the monolithic leadership of Kim Jong Il and surely achieving the cause of building a thriving nation by remarkably increasing the militancy of the WPK and its leadership role.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK are now full of great conviction and optimism about a hopeful future. The slogan "Let us defend with our very lives the Party Central Committee headed by great Comrade Kim Jong Il!" serves as the slogan of faith for all the people and servicepersons and a banner of their single-minded unity.
					
					 The conference once again strikingly demonstrated the true picture of the WPK as an experienced and tested political staff leading the revolution and construction to victory by increasing its leadership role as required by the developing reality.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will give fullest play to the inexhaustible mental power of Kim Il Sung's nation under the leadership of the great WPK and perform uninterrupted miracles and feats in the efforts to accomplish the cause of building a thriving nation.

articles.title: Halt to Combined War Exercises Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Halt to Combined War Exercises Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The Media Headquarters, the Academic Headquarters and the Youth and Students Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration released a joint statement on Nov. 27 demanding the U.S. and the south Korean puppet war-like forces stop their combined war exercises.
					 The statement said that the military tension is being further screwed up on the Korean Peninsula owing to the south Korea-U.S. combined war exercises in the West Sea of Korea with even the U.S. nuclear carrier George Washington involved.
					
					 If an all-out war breaks out due to the escalated military confrontation, it will be the Korean nation which will suffer from it, the statement noted.
					
					 It is a dangerous act that the U.S. and the south Korean authorities are staging the war exercises by mobilizing the nuclear carrier at a time when the danger of war is mounting on the Korean Peninsula, it said, urging them to stop the combined exercises aimed at invading the DPRK.
					
					 The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification said in a statement on the same day that the danger of  war is increasing on the Korean Peninsula due to the U.S., urging it to stop interfering in the internal affairs of the Korean nation any longer and demanding its forces go home.
					
					 The statement called upon all the fellow countrymen to pool their efforts to deal a heavy blow at the moves to ignite a war of aggression against the DPRK and drive the U.S. forces, the root cause of war, out of this land as soon as possible.
					
					 The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification and the Kyonggi Solidarity for Progress in south Korea held a press conference on Nov. 28 denouncing the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet armed forces for staging joint military exercises targeted against the DPRK.

articles.title: Meeting Held in Japan to Hear Report on IIJI's Visit to DPRK
articles.content:
Meeting Held in Japan to Hear Report on IIJI's Visit to DPRK 
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held in Gunma Prefecture, Japan, on Nov. 20 to hear a report from the secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea and his party who participated in the celebrations of the 65th anniversary of the foundation of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Present there were officials of the Japanese Gunma Society for Korean Studies, the Gunma Prefectural Council for Japan-Korea Friendship and Solidarity and the IIJI and masses.
					
					 Kenichi Ogami, secretary general of the IIJI, said in his report that the WPK significantly marked its 65th founding anniversary amid the keen interest of the world progressive people.
					
					 He described the 65 years covered by the WPK steering the cause of independence under the uplifted banner of the Juche idea as a history of victory and glory which powerfully demonstrated the might of the single-minded unity of the leader, the party and the masses.
					
					 He stressed the need for the world progressive people ardently following the Juche idea to wage a dynamic struggle for the independence of their countries and the world full of conviction and optimism about victory under the uplifted banner of Juche.

articles.title: KPA's Self-Defensive Step Favored
articles.content:
KPA's Self-Defensive Step Favored
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- Pedro De Oliveira, assistant to the national chairman of the Central Committee of the Brazilian Communist Party, issued a statement on Nov. 24 denouncing the south Korean puppet war-like forces for their grave military provocation in the West Sea of Korea.
					 The statement said that the members of the Brazilian Communist Party expressed solidarity with the Workers' Party of Korea resolutely countering the provocation of the south Korean puppet group. It condemned the south Korean authorities for staging war maneuvers against the DPRK codenamed Hoguk, straining the situation on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Noting that the Korean People's Army took such resolute military step as reacting to the military provocation of the south Korean puppet group with a prompt and powerful physical strike, it strongly demanded the U.S. and the south Korean puppet group stop at once the military provocations on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy and the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru released statements on the same day in support of the self-defensive step taken by the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK to cope with the military provocation of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet clique.
					
					 The organizations in their statements supported the communique of the KPA Supreme Command and extended firm solidarity to the just struggle of the Korean people.
					
					 They stressed that the world progressives aspiring after socialism would always stand by the KPA standing firm guard over the socialist bulwark.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Group's Military Provocation Flailed
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Group's Military Provocation Flailed
Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The United Confederation of Koreans in Russia in a statement issued on Nov. 27 accused the south Korean puppet group of committing such reckless military provocation as firing shells into the territorial waters of the DPRK around Yonphyong Island in the West Sea of Korea on Nov. 23.
					 If clouds often hang, it is bound to rain, the statement said, adding that no sooner had the present south Korean authorities come to power than bedeviled the inter-Korean relations which had favorably developed and openly put a brake on the wheel of the inter-Korean contact and relations of cooperation.
					
					 In a word, the recent provocation was a product of the anti-DPRK and anti-reunification confrontation policy of the south Korean authorities, it noted.
					
					 The Federation of Korean Economic Workers in China said in a statement issued on Nov. 26 that it was quite natural that the Korean People's Army standing guard over the inviolable territorial waters of the country took such resolute military step as reacting to the south Korean puppet group's military provocation with a prompt and powerful physical strike. The statement went on:
					
					 Nevertheless, the puppet group is seeking to stage the largest-ever combined exercises by introducing latest war hardware including the U.S. nuclear carrier George Washington into the West Sea of Korea while crying out for "punishment" and "retaliation" against someone just like a thief crying "Stop thief!"
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors should bear in mind the warnings of the DPRK and stop its rash actions.
					
					 Meanwhile, the Yanbian District Association of the General Association of Koreans in China and the Yanbian District Youth Committee of the Association of Young Koreans in China issued a joint statement on the same day denouncing the south Korean puppet group for its reckless military provocation.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Holidays Celebrated in Mexico and Peru
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Holidays Celebrated in Mexico and Peru
Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Mexico issued bulletins on the occasion of the 19th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					 The Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism issued bulletin No. 49. The bulletin carried an article titled "Supreme Commander Kim Jong Il's outlook on armed forces" together with his photo. The article said that he formulated the original outlook on armed forces that the soldier masses are essential for army building and activities and they are the basic factor of deciding a victory in the war by applying the principle of the Juche idea that man is the master of everything and decides everything.
					
					 The Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea released bulletin No. 68. The bulletin in an article titled "Supreme commander and his soldiers" dealt with touching stories about the profound loving care shown by him for soldiers during his ceaseless inspection of KPA units.
					
					 Meanwhile, the Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism issued bulletin on the occasion of the 93rd birth anniversary of Kim Jong Suk, an anti-Japanese heroine.
					
					 The bulletin in articles under various titles said that Kim Jong Suk brought up Kim Jong Il to be a revolutionary having profound love for the country and the people and made a great contribution to the founding and strengthening of the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK.

articles.title: Tienen lugar en Pyongyang actos dedicados a efemerides laosianas
articles.content:
Tienen lugar en Pyongyang actos dedicados a efemerides laosianas
Pyongyang, 30 de noviembre (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 35o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Democratica Popular Lao y del 90o de natalicio del presidente Kaysone Phomvihane, tuvieron lugar este martes en el Club para el Cuerpo Diplomatico Taedonggang un mitin y proyeccion filmica.
					Al mitin fueron invitados el embajador Chaleune Warinthrasak y otros miembros de la embajada laosiana en Corea.
					
					Tambien estuvieron presentes Ryang Man Gil, presidente del Comite Popular de la ciudad de Pyongyang y de la Asociacion de Amistad Corea-Laos, los funcionarios interesados y trabajadores capitalinos.
					
					En su discurso pronunciado en la ocasion, Ryang senalo que las relaciones de amistad entre ambos paises preparadas por el Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Presidente Kaysone Phomvihane se desarrollan favorablemente bajo la profunda atencion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il y el estimado camarada Choummaly Saynasone.
					
					Recordo que ambos paises vinieron cooperandose estrechadamente en la lucha contra el imperialismo y por construir el socialismo.
					
					Al igual que en el pasado, la RPDC se esforzara activamente por desarrollar las relaciones de amistad preparadas por los dirigentes de los dos paises, concluyo.
					
					Chaleune Warinthrasak, en su discurso, expreso profundo agradecimiento al Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien envia apoyo material y espiritual a Laos.
					
					Deseo que el pueblo coreano, unido firmemente en torno al Dirigente, logre grandes exitos en la construccion de gran potencia prospera socialista.
					
					Terminado el acto, los participantes vieron la septima parte del documental coreano "Encuentros del gran lider, camarada Kim Il Sung con jefes de Estado y personalidades renombradas del extranjero".

articles.title: ATCC comenta proceder de Japon en el escenario de la ONU
articles.content:
ATCC comenta proceder de Japon en el escenario de la ONU
						
Pyongyang, 30 de noviembre (ATCC) -- En el Tercer Comite del 65o periodo de sesiones de la Asamblea General de la ONU, Japon tomo la delantera en la aprobacion de la "resolucion de derechos humanos" contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hablando del "problema de secuestro".
					  El delegado japones dijo que sigue pendiente todavia el "problema de secuestro" de los japoneses e insistio en que cuestionen la situacion de DDHH de la RPDC en la Asamblea General de la ONU y otros lugares, hablando del "incumplimiento" y "la falta de concretas medidas de accion".
					
					  Cada vez que se le presenta la oportunidad en la arena internacional, Japon plantea obstinadamente el ya resuelto "problema de secuestro" en su sucio e cinico intento de encubrir a toda costa sus archi-crimenes antieticos del pasado y eludir la liquidacion de los mismos distrayendo la atencion de la sociedad internacional.
					
					  Japon ni siquiera tiene derecho a hablar de los derechos humanos.
					
					  En el periodo de dominacion sobre Corea, los imperialistas japoneses cometieron escalofriantes barbaridades contra el pueblo coreano y este pais fue registrado en la historia como el criminal de guerra con el expediente de crimenes de violacion de derechos humanos sin precedentes.
					
					  Arrestaron a mas de 8 millones y 400 jovenes y adultos coreanos para imponerles los trabajos de esclavitud de edad media y usarlos como carne de canon en las guerras de agresion.
					
					Mas de un millon de ellos resultaron asesinados salvajemente.
					
					Para colmo, convirtieron a 200 mil coreanas desde ninas de unos 10 anos y hasta las casadas en esclavas sexuales de los agresores japoneses y se las llevaban a todos los escenarios de combate violando la juventud y virginidad de ellas.
					
					  Luego, las mataban sin vacilacion alguna para encubrir esa fechoria.
					
					  Hasta la fecha, se escuchan las denuncias de las victimas, que sufren todavia fisica y mentalmente aunque paso mas de medio siglo despues de la Segunda Guerra Mundial, y las voces de la sociedad internacional en demanda de esclarecimiento de la verdad de los crimenes de Japon, la disculpa e indemnizacion a nivel estatal.
					
					  Pero, Japon trata de eludir su responsabilidad enganando al mundo como si la victima fuese el mismo.
					
					  Cuando aborde el tema de DDHH, la sociedad internacional debe cuestionar primero esos peores crimenes de Japon exigiendole liquidarlos pronto.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun defiende uso de energia nuclear en fines pacificos
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun defiende uso de energia nuclear en fines pacificos
						
  Pyongyang, 30 de noviembre (ATCC) -- En su articulo individual divulgado hoy, el diario Rodong Sinmun senala que hoy dia, constituyen una indetenible corriente mundial desarrollar y usar la energia nuclear con fines pacificos.
					  En los ultimos anos, se desarrolla vertiginosamente la economia y crece cada dia mas la demanda de la energia, pese al agotamiento de combustibles fosiles, comienza el articulo y continua:
					
					Por lo tanto, se eleva a escala internacional la atencion a las nuevas fuentes energeticas.
					
					  Numerosos paises se mueven activamente para usar el combustible alternativo reduciendo el consumo de los fosiles.
					
					  El desarrollo y el uso de energia nuclear para fines pacificos no son un privilegio de algunos paises sino el derecho infaltable para todos los paises del mundo, en particular, los en vias de desarrollo.
					
					  El problema es la pauta de doble rasero de algunas fuerzas occidentales que cuestionan, presionan y sancionan a los paises, que no les agradan, por realizar actividades nucleares con fines pacificos, permitiendo y hasta cooperando cuando se tratan de los paises que les gustan.
					
					  Aunque ellas insisten en que los paises fuera del Tratado de No Proliferacion no tienen el derecho al desarrollo nuclear pacifico, la realidad no es asi.
					
					  Las actividades nucleares con fines pacificos son el derecho soberano de todos los miembros de la sociedad internacional que nadie puede privarselo.
					
					  La RPDC acelera la construccion de la central de reactores de agua ligera para completar su autoctona estructura industrial de energia nuclear.
					
					Este paso conviene a la tendencia internacional del desarrollo y uso de ese tipo energetico y es una medida para garantizar la creciente demanda sobre la energia.
					
					  Actualmente, en Corea se libra activamente la construccion del reactor de agua ligera y para proveer a este de combustible, funciona una moderna fabrica de uranio concentrado dotada de miles de separadores centrifugos.
					
					  Tomara auge en el futuro en la RPDC el desarrollo de energia nuclear con fines pacificos para cubrir la demanda de electricidad.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena voto del Sur de Corea a la resolucion anti-RPDC
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena voto del Sur de Corea a la resolucion anti-RPDC
Pyongyang, 30 de noviembre (ATCC) -- Recientemente, las autoridades surcoreanas propusieron junto con las fuerzas foraneas en la ONU el intrigante "proyecto de resolucion de DDHH del Norte de Corea" y votaron a favor sin vacilacion alguna.
					Este hecho significa otra grave violacion de la dignidad y soberania de la RPDC y sucia artimana orientada a recrudecer en la arena internacional la campana para atropellarla, siendo una muestra clara de la anejada ambicion de las autoridades surcoreanas de enfrentarse hasta el final con la RPDC.
					
					  Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual del dia 30 y continua:
					
					  El Sur de Corea es la zona mundialmente famosa por sofocar la democracia y violar terriblemente los derechos humanos, inclusive el derecho a la vida de las masas trabajadoras.
					
					  A citar un ejemplo, el tribunal surcoreano sentencio hace poco como culpables a los que murieron quemados en la represion bestial del "poder" traidor y fascista mientras realizaban una protesta por el desalojo forzado.
					
					  Sin embargo, los titeres surcoreanos calumnian a la RPDC en la arena internacional junto con las fuerzas foraneas hablando tanto del intrigante "problema de DDHH del Norte de Corea".
					
					Esto no pasa de ser una artimana para realizar su ambicion de derrumbar el regimen de la RPDC y realizar la "reunificacion bajo el sistema democratico liberal", la cual buscara solo la agravacion de desconfianza y enfrentamiento y la guerra entre ambas partes coreanas. He aqui el caracter criminal de la campana anti-RPDC en el tema de "DDHH".
					
					  Son traidores a la nacion los pandilleros de Lee Myung Bak que no piensan en otra cosa sino en la confrontacion y guerra sin hacer caso de las relaciones Norte-Sur ni del destino de la nacion.
					
					  Los titeres surcoreanos deben parar de inmediato su necio complot anti-RPDC que llevara a la ruina a ellos mismos.

articles.title: Minju Joson condena la escalada de ejercicios militares contra la RPDC
articles.content:
Minju Joson condena la escalada de ejercicios militares contra la RPDC
						
Pyongyang, 30 de noviembre (ATCC) -- Estados Unidos y los belicistas surcoreanos libran desde el dia 28 el aventurero ejercicio de guerra contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en el Mar Oeste. 
					En un comentario individual divulgado hoy, el rotativo Minju Joson revelo la peligrosidad de la escalada de los movimientos de aquellos para desatar la guerra de agresion a la RPDC, advirtiendo que la recien comenzada maniobra puede convertirse en la guerra total en cualquier momento.
					
					  Lo que no se puede pasar a la ligera es la presencia de "George Washington", portaaviones nuclear norteamericano de tamano supergrande, comienza el comentarista y continua:
					
					  La escalada de acciones provocativas de EE.UU. y los belicistas surcoreanos muestra claramente su siniestra intencion de agravar la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y provocar la guerra contra la RPDC bajo cualquier pretexto.
					
					  Realmente, a las ordenes del traidor Lee Myung Bak de "estar listos frente al combate local y a las fuerzas asimetricas", el circulo militar surcoreano anda enloquecido por trazar las nuevas "reglas de combate" y emplazar el "arma teledirigida a precision para batir las instalaciones subterraneas del Norte de Corea".
					
					  Si EE.UU. y los belicistas surcoreanos disparan un obus hacia el territorio y el mar sagrados de la RPDC, los provocadores lo pagaran muy caro.
					
					  Ellos deben desistir de su intento de desatar la guerra contra la RPDC viendo correctamente quien es su rival.
